long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When a user who has published articles or blog posts on Medium.com is signed into their Medium.com account, this extension enables the retrieval of that user's 10 most recent Medium articles in the format of an HTML string containing an RSS feed. Users should install this extension if they want to be able to access their Medium articles or blog posts in a portable format, thus allowing them to share their content to a broader audience if desired. This extension guarantees privacy by retrieving content if and only if the user is signed in to Medium.
